sections.heading: Funeral expenses for deceased volunteer firefighters
sections.text:
(a) The funeral expenses of a deceased member of a volunteer fire company, volunteer fire company ladies auxiliary, or volunteer ambulance and rescue company must be paid in the amount of $7,000.(b) (1) An individual is eligible for funeral expens

§ 6702A. Source of payments under this chapter.Payments made under this chapter must be made from the fund established under subchapter III of Chapter 65 of this title. The General Assembly shall, when necessary, provide adequate funding to the fund to cover claims under this chapter.85 Del. Laws, c. 215,

6750. Funeral expenses for deceased volunteer firefighters [Transferred].Transferred to § 6701A of this title by 85 Del. Laws, c. 215, § 1, effective Oct. 1, 2025.
